Guys, if you want the movies, music and sound effects, just download the following files.

-Music.pak
-Sounds.pak
-Videos.pak

From this torrent:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6265623/Crysis_2_Limited_Edition-CLONEDVD-%5Btracker.BTARENA.org%5D

And place the three files (2.89Gb) in the "Crysis 2/gamecrysis2" folder.

Problem solved. Do this, and you will have the complete game, with nothing missing. It worked for me, as I was able to see the cutscenes and the ending, as well as listen to the music in the extras menu.
